6881.description: Port for incoming data. You may need to open it(protocol: udp) on your firewall. Suggested default: 6881. Should NOT be changed
6881.label: uTorrent Incoming Port

8080.description: Port for utorrent Web interface. Suggested default: 8080.
8080.label: WebUI port

/settings.description: Holds all the utorrent settings files and databases.
/settings.label: uTorrent Settings

UTORRENT_UID.description: Enter a valid UID to run utorrent as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
UTORRENT_UID.label: UID to run uTorrent as.

UTORRENT_GID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
UTORRENT_GID.label: GID to run uTorrent as.
